name: Algo-mission
description:
Algo-mission:  An introduction to the idea of telling a computer what to do.

How to play:

  • Use the controls to provide instructions to the bus
  • The aim is to get the bus to the bus stop to pick up the passenger
  • Press the Go button to run your instructions
  • Remember to press the 'Bus Stop' button to wait for the passenger to board when you get there!
  • Watch out for any birds - use your horn to scare them away, as they'll be a big angry if you drive too close without warning!

This game is aimed at younger children, and allows simple directional instructions to be given to control a bus.

The aim is to provide an quick introductory experience of algorithms and the associated joys of working with machines that do what they're told rather than what you want!

View the source: https://github.com/itfelstead/algo-mission

View credits: https://github.com/itfelstead/algo-mission/blob/master/NOTICES.md
